Comment 15: 
Can somebody think of a better way to resolve the circular dependency?

As far as I remember my original plan was to eventually check-in cgo generated code in
repository, so that runtime/race does not depend on cgo. But I am not sure whether it's
possible, because the will need to contain both 6c-compiled c files and gcc-compiled c
files. Probably we can special case this in go tool, just as runtime/cgo package.
